overview:
Greetings!

I am a Mass Communication graduate of the University of Mindanao, Matina Campus, Davao City with an ongoing Masterâ€™s Degree on Development Administration in the University of Southeastern Philippines Obrero Campus with working experience gained from the online jobs, Bible School and Church works.

I am writing to apply for the position you are offering that would enable me to make full use of my administrative and organizational skills. I have well-developed written and oral communication skills that can be very useful in carrying out the duties for the above-mentioned position.

On top of these competencies, I adhere to a work ethic and can effectively interact with people across all levels of the organizational structure. I believe I can be an asset to your organization.

My resume is enclosed with this cover letter. It shows my overall expertise and experience in the field. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss my suitability for the position and comply with your other requirements. I can be contacted at 09187367710 or 321-2945; email rizaldemaasin@ymail.com

Thank you very much.

Sincerely, RIZALDE RUTA MAASIN Applicant
